languages.text: {n}Маражай взирает на вас из-под полуопущенных век. Его обнаженное тело словно целиком сплетено из жгутов сухих и гибких мышц, а бледная кожа, отмеченная такими же следами насилия, как ваша, как будто слабо светится в окружающем полумраке. Друкари стирает кровь с ключицы и облизывает пальцы, смакуя остатки "пиршества".{/n} "Ты пробудил{mf|ся|ась}, мо{mf|й|я} звер{mf|ек|ушка}".

{n}Marazhai stares at you from beneath half-lowered lids. His naked body seems to be knit from ropes of lean, lithe muscle, and his pale skin, marked with the same traces of violence as your own, seems to glow faintly in the half-light. Blood has pooled in the hollows of his clavicles — he wipes it away and licks his fingers, savouring the remnants of the 'feast.'{/n} "You are awake, my pet."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай взирает на вас из-под полуопущенных век. Его обнаженное тело словно целиком сплетено из жгутов сухих и гибких мышц, а бледная кожа, отмеченная такими же следами насилия, как ваша, как будто слабо светится в окружающем полумраке. languages.text: {n}玛拉斋半眯着眼睛，盯着你。他赤裸的身体仿佛完全由精壮的肌肉编织而成的，苍白的皮肤上带着与你身上同样的暴力痕迹，在半明半暗的光线下微微发亮。一潭鲜血积在他锁骨的凹陷处，他擦去鲜血，舔了舔手指，回味着“盛宴”的余韵。{/n}“你醒了，我的宠物。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at you from beneath half-lowered lids. His naked body seems to be knit from ropes of lean, lithe muscle, and his pale skin, marked with the same traces of violence as your own, seems to glow faintly in the half-light. Blood has pooled in the hollows of his clavicles — he wipes it away and licks his fingers, savouring the remnants of the 'feast.'{/n} "You are awake, my pet."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、半ば伏せたまぶたの下からこちらを見つめる。その裸の体は引き締まったしなやかな筋肉のロープで編まれているようで、あなたと同じく惨劇の痕が残る白い肌は薄明りの中ほのかに輝いているように見える。鎖骨のくぼみには血が溜まっていた。彼は血を拭き取った指を舐めて『宴』の名残を味わっている。{/n}「起きたか、俺のペット」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at you from beneath half-lowered lids. His naked body seems to be knit from ropes of lean, lithe muscle, and his pale skin, marked with the same traces of violence as your own, seems to glow faintly in the half-light. Blood has pooled in the hollows of his clavicles — he wipes it away and licks his fingers, savouring the remnants of the 'feast.'{/n} "You are awake, my pet."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te observa con ojos entreabiertos. Su cuerpo desnudo parece estar hecho puramente de músculo fibroso y su pálida piel, que tiene las mismas marcas de violencia que la tuya, parece brillar bajo la tenue luz. La sangre se ha acumulado en los huecos de sus clavículas. Se la seca con los dedos y los chupa, disfrutando de los restos de vuestro «festín».{/n} «Por fin despiertas, mascotita».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at you from beneath half-lowered lids. His naked body seems to be knit from ropes of lean, lithe muscle, and his pale skin, marked with the same traces of violence as your own, seems to glow faintly in the half-light. Blood has pooled in the hollows of his clavicles — he wipes it away and licks his fingers, savouring the remnants of the 'feast.'{/n} "You are awake, my pet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te observa con ojos entreabiertos. Su cuerpo desnudo parece estar hecho puramente de músculo fibroso y su pálida piel, que tiene las mismas marcas de violencia que la tuya, parece brillar bajo la tenue luz. La sangre se ha acumulado en los huecos de sus clavículas. Se la seca con los dedos y los chupa, disfrutando de los restos de vuestro «festín».{/n} «Por fin despiertas, mascotita».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous fixe du regard par-dessous ses paupières mi-closes. Son corps nu semble tressé à partir de fines cordes de muscles noueux et sa peau blafarde, marquée comme la vôtre au fer rouge de la violence, paraît luire faiblement dans le clair-obscur. Il essuie d'une main le sang accumulé dans les creux de ses clavicules et se lèche langoureusement les doigts comme pour savourer jusqu'à la dernière miette ce « festin » tant attendu.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|réveillé|réveillée}, {mf|mon petit|ma petite} esclave. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at you from beneath half-lowered lids. His naked body seems to be knit from ropes of lean, lithe muscle, and his pale skin, marked with the same traces of violence as your own, seems to glow faintly in the half-light. Blood has pooled in the hollows of his clavicles — he wipes it away and licks his fingers, savouring the remnants of the 'feast.'{/n} "You are awake, my pet."

Son corps nu semble tressé à partir de fines cordes de muscles noueux et sa peau blafarde, marquée comme la vôtre au fer rouge de la violence, paraît luire faiblement dans le clair-obscur. Il essuie d'une main le sang accumulé dans les creux de ses clavicules et se lèche langoureusement les doigts comme pour savourer jusqu'à la dernière miette ce « festin » tant attendu.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|réveillé|réveillée}, {mf|mon petit|ma petite} esclave. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich mit halb gesenkten Augenlidern an. Sein nackter Körper scheint einzig aus schlanken und geschmeidigen Muskeln zu bestehen, und seine blasse Haut, die die gleichen Spuren der Gewalt wie deine eigene aufweist, scheint im Halblicht schwach zu schimmern. In seinen Schlüsselbeingruben schwimmen Blutlachen – er wischt sie weg und leckt sich danach die Finger. Er genießt die Überreste seines "Gelages".{/n} "Ihr seid erwacht, {mf|treuer Ergebener|treue Ergebene}."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at you from beneath half-lowered lids. Er genießt die Überreste seines "Gelages".{/n} "Ihr seid erwacht, {mf|treuer Ergebener|treue Ergebene}."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, kısık göz kapaklarının ardından sana bakıyor. Çıplak bedeni, ince ve esnek kas dokularından örülmüş gibi duruyor. Solgun derisi ise sendeki şiddet izlerinin loş ışıkta hafifçe parlıyor gibi duran benzerlerini taşıyor. Köprücük kemiklerinin çukurlarında toplanan kanı silerek parmaklarını yalıyor. 'Ziyafetten' geriye kalanların tadını çıkarıyor.{/n} "Uyanmışsın evcil hayvanım."
